SELECT COUNT(*) AS eventNum FROM sd_event se LEFT JOIN sd_event_type et ON se.event_type_id = et.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data sdd ON et.prev_control_type = sdd.dict_value AND sdd.dict_type = #{prevControlType} WHERE sdd.dict_value = #{dictValue} AND et.is_usable = '1'
AND se.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS eventNum FROM sd_event se LEFT JOIN sd_event_type et ON se.event_type_id = et.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data sdd ON et.prev_control_type = sdd.dict_value AND sdd.dict_type = #{prevControlType} WHERE sdd.dict_value = #{dictValue} AND et.is_usable = '1'
AND se.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS eventNum FROM sd_fault_list sfl WHERE 1 = 1
AND sfl.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT rp.plan_name AS planName FROM sd_reserve_plan rp LEFT JOIN sd_tunnel_subarea sts ON rp.subarea_id = sts.s_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND sts.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT m.material_name AS materialName, m.number, m.station FROM sd_material m WHERE 1 = 1
AND m.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT sep.user_name AS userName, sep.phone FROM sd_emergency_per sep WHERE 1 = 1
AND sep.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT ev.plate_number AS plateNumber, ev.v_type AS vType, IFNULL(t.tunnel_name,'') AS tunnelName FROM sd_emergency_vehicle ev LEFT JOIN sd_tunnels t ON ev.org_id = t.dept_id WHERE 1 =1
AND t.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}
